sn34.46:1.3: samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo …
sn34.46:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34.46:1.5: samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca …
sn34.46:1.6: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṁ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṁ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.46:1.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ …pe…
